Common.Highlight.Common.Text: The Outlet Shoppes at Cleveland offers 323,000 SF of outlet retail shopping, restaurants and entertainment on two levels with unmatched access, visibility and high traffic counts.
CBRE has been engaged by developer Horizon Group Properties to lease the entertainment and food & beverage spaces that will complement over 60+ national outlet retailers.
Located across from Burke Lakefront Airport at I-90 & Route 2 interchange with traffic counts of over 125,154 VPD.
Projected Opening Spring 2022

HGP works with national and international retailers such as Tory Burch, Kate Spade, Cole Haan, Polo Ralph Lauren, The North Face, Nautica, Tommy Hilfiger, Calvin Klein, American Eagle, Skechers, The Children’s Place, Old Navy, Carter’s|OshKosh, Levi’s, Vera Bradley, Express, Michael Kors, Steve Madden, Coach, Armani, Francesca’s, Nike, Adidas, GAP, Under Armour, Torrid, VANS, New Balance, Columbia, Timberland, Wilson’s Leather, Rack Room and much more.
With close proximity to the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame, the three Cleveland professional sports venues, the Great Lakes Science Center, and more.
Greater Cleveland welcomed 19.2 million visitors in 2018, up 3.9% from 2017.

About the Developer - Horizon Group Properties - Distinguished for developing, managing, and marketing outlet shopping centers. Each property offers a wide variety of quality designer brands at discounted prices in a compelling outdoor environment within attractive markets. The Executive Team has over 150 years of combined Shopping Center Experience. Based in Rosemont, IL, Horizon currently operates eight designer outlet centers from coast to coast.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The Outlet Shoppes at Cleveland will be located at Interstate-90 and Highway 2 interchange with average daily traffic counts of 125,154, across from the Burke Lakefront Airport. On Highway 2 near
Ninth Street, the center will be close to the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame, all three professional sports venues, federal, state and municipal government offices, downtown hotels and office high-rises, the USS Cod Submarine Memorial, and the Great Lakes Science Center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Cleveland is is seeking select ENTERTAINMENT / FOOD & BEVERAGE CONCEPTS to join the robust tenant mix at THE OUTLET SHOPPES AT CLEVELAND.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: The Outlet Shoppes at Cleveland - Entertainment / Food & Beverage Concepts

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: High profile 2,500 SF former fast casual on Euclid Avenue in Downtown Cleveland.
Space includes pizza oven, walk in coolers, & remaining FF&E from previous tenant
Located in the heart of the downtown Cleveland Central Business District; 16 million square feet of office space & 79,646 daytime population in a 1 mile radius!
Walk Score: 94 | Transit Score: 89 | Bike Score: 59 (Source: Walkscore.com)
Neighboring fast casual restaurants include: Shake Shack, Chipotle, Jimmy Johns, J Gumbo, Potbelly, Balance Grille, REBoL, Taco Bell Cantina & more
Walking distance to Public Square, which recently underwent a $50 M renovation
Next door to House of Blues music venue
Downtown Cleveland’s population is projected to reach 23,000 by the end of 2020 and 30,000 residents by 2030
Greater Cleveland attracted 18.5 M visitors in 2017. (Source: Downtown Cleveland Alliance Q3 2018 Report)

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- High profile 1,800 SF former fast casual on Euclid Avenue in Downtown Cleveland.
- Located in the heart of the downtown Cleveland Central Business District; 16 million square feet of office space & 79,646 daytime population in a 1 mile radius!
- Neighboring fast casual restaurants include: Shake Shack, Chipotle, J Gumbo, Potbelly, Balance Grille, REBoL, Taco Bell Cantina & more.

- Next door to House of Blues music venue.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Between Ruoff Mortgage (Coming) and Cleveland Hostel.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ohio City/W25th Retail Location Neighboring restaurants & breweries include Great Lakes Brewery, Market Garden Brewery, Bier Markt, Nano Brew, TownHall, Bakersfield & more. Walking distance to historic West Side Market and Cleveland Hostel. Across the bridge from downtown Cleveland; easily accessible to sporting venues, CBD & downtown residents. 2,500 new apartment units planned or under construction on the near west side. Population of 109,691 people in a 3 mile radius; daytime population of 192,075 in a mile radius.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 6,000 SF of Retail Space Available in Cleveland, OH

Common.SubdivisionName.Common.Text: Lorain Ave. - 2,943 SF Retail / Restaurant Space

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Located just off the corner at W. 25th Street and Lorain Avenue. Located directly across from the Westside Market. Potential 2-story space with an additional 4,623 SF on the 2nd Floor, for a combined 7,566 SF. The space also offers views and access to the courtyard area.

Common.SubdivisionName.Common.Text: W 25th Street - 6,677 SF Retail / Restaurant Space

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Prime W 25th Street retail / restaurant space with great visibility and street frontage. The space also offers courtyard views and access.
W 25th Street retail space located near the pedestrian pass through to the event lobby and courtyard area.

Common.SubdivisionName.Common.Text: Gehring Street - 4,389 SF Retail / Restaurant Space

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Gehring Street - 4,389 SF retail / restaurant space. Located on the Gehring Street with access to the courtyard area.

Common.SubdivisionName.Common.Text: Lorain Avenue - 2nd Floor - 4,623 SF Retail / Restaurant Space

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Located on the 2nd Floor along Lorain Avenue. The space can be combined for a total of 7,566 SF with the space on the first floor.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Retail Space: 36,000 SF on the street level of the Residential Tower (Phase 1)
290 Luxury Apartments on floors 2 - 8 at the corner of West 25th and Lorain Avenue, with unmatched amenities. Penthouse event center, patios, fitness, bike storage and more.
Parking Garage: 350 car multi-level underground parking garage with an entrance through the office tower.
Public Parking: Steps away from the West Side Market area parking lot with 450 spaces (90 minutes free + $1.00 per hour thereafter), additionally there are 25 street level parking spaces on site.
Amenity Parking & Access: In addition to the typical parking, the property will offer Valet service for restaurants, rideshare/taxi areas, and temporary convenience parking.

Exterior Courtyard / Park: Directly across from the West Side Market on Lorain Avenue, will be Ohio City’s newest public green space, the neighborhoods new “living room” activated with art, cultural and family events. A new dynamic gathering space for the dynamic neighborhood.
Potential 2-story Retail Flagship Corner (W. 25th St & Lorain Ave) Potential 2-story Restaurant Space with unobstructed  views of Cleveland’s Skyline (Lorain Ave & Gehring St)
Expansive ceiling heights throughout the project

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: SE Corner of West 25th Street & Lorain Avenue, Cleveland 2047 West 25th Street, Cleveland (Ohio City), OH 44113

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
INTRO - Ohio City will feature 36,000 SF of Retail space on the street level of the Residential Tower (Phase 1). Along with 290 Luxury Apartments on floors 2 - 8 at the corner of West 25th and Lorain Avenue, with unmatched amenities. Penthouse event center, patios, fitness, bike storage and more.
Beautifully exposed Mass-Timber construction. Shell delivery Spring of 2021.
Designed by Hartshorne Plunkard Architecture.  Developed and Owned by Harbor Bay Real Estate Advisors.  Leased by CBRE, Inc.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: INTRO Cleveland's Most Dynamic Neighborhood - Ohio City - New Construction

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Indoor public parking floor (40 spaces)
14’4” - 18’0” ceiling heights

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Church + State is a new mixed-use project in the Hingetown enclave of Ohio
City. It includes an 11-story building (The State), a 6-story building (The Church),
and a 10,000 s.f. public pedestrian way leading from Detroit Ave. to Church Ave.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Church + State: Hingetown / Ohio City / Cleveland
